title: Rural Municipality of Great Bend No. 405
text:
The Rural Municipality of Great Bend No. 405 (<a href="Canada%202016%20Census">2016 population</a>: ) is a <a href="List%20of%20rural%20municipalities%20in%20Saskatchewan">rural municipality</a> (RM) in the <a href="Provinces%20and%20territories%20of%20Canada">Canadian province</a> of <a href="Saskatchewan">Saskatchewan</a> within <a href="Division%20No.%2016%2C%20Saskatchewan">Census Division No. 16</a> and <a href="SARM%20Division%20No.%206">Division No. 6</a>. Located in the west-central portion of the province, it is approximately to the northwest of <a href="Saskatoon">Saskatoon</a>.
History.
The RM of Great Bend No. 405 incorporated as a rural municipality on December 12, 1910. It was originally formed as Local Improvement District (LID) No. 405 on June 4, 1910 through the amalgamation of LIDs 20-E-3 (originally established June 5, 1905), 20-D-3 (originally established August 13, 1906), and 21-D-3 (originally established November 14, 1906).
Geography.
Communities and localities.
The following <a href="List%20of%20municipalities%20in%20Saskatchewan%23Urban%20municipalities">urban municipalities</a> are surrounded by the RM.
The following unincorporated communities are within the RM.
Demographics.
In the <a href="2016%20Canadian%20Census">2016 Census of Population</a> conducted by <a href="Statistics%20Canada">Statistics Canada</a>, the RM of Great Bend No. 405 recorded a population of living in of its total private dwellings, a change from its 2011 population of . With a land area of , it had a population density of in 2016.
In the <a href="2011%20Canadian%20Census">2011 Census of Population</a>, the RM of Great Bend No. 405 recorded a population of , a change from its 2006 population of . With a land area of , it had a population density of in 2011.
Economy.
The majority of economic activity in the area is related to agriculture, predominantly <a href="grain">grain</a> farming and <a href="cattle">cattle</a> <a href="ranching">ranching</a>.
Government.
The RM of Great Bend No. 405 is governed by an elected municipal council and an appointed administrator that meets on the second Wednesday of every month. The <a href="Reeve%20%28Canada%29">reeve</a> of the RM is Ron Saunders while its administrator is Valerie Fendelet. The RM's office is located in Borden.
